arts.ttl: “Embarrassing” | West Ham’s awful draw with Toffees increases Lopetegui pressure
arts.sum: West Ham’s dreadful draw to Everton surely puts Julen Lopetegui on the brink. Today’s match between West Ham and Everton always had the possibility of being a low-scoring affair, but what spectators witnessed is quite possibly the most boring game of the season. Despite keeping a rare clean sheet, things couldn’t have been much worse... arts.ttl: “Why not?” | West Ham could replace Lopetegui with serial winner
arts.sum: Julen Lopetegui’s position is up in the air following West Ham’s draw with Everton, and they could instead end up bringing in a highly rated European manager, according to conflicting reports. An uninspiring performance which showed absolutely no signs of improvement nor any indication that the club is moving in the right direction has now... arts.ttl: Martin Keown claims Julen Lopetegui has 'lost the players' amid latest West Ham setback
arts.sum: West Ham failed to score for the second game in a row as Julen Lopetegui's side were held to a goalless draw by Everton at the London Stadium on Saturday afternoon

arts.ttl: 'Their best player': Everton ace leaves West Ham boss frustrated, he was 'very good' in 0-0 draw

arts.sum: Andy Irving also signed from Austria Klagenfurt for approaching £2 million before re-joining the club on loan, while Flynn Downes moved temporarily to Southampton.
